casebody.data:
Clifford S. EATON, petitioner,
v.
Monica RECKTENWALD, Warden. No. 14-8279. Supreme Court of the United States March 2, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
